OOC: I wont. Rodimus is MIA for awile.

::Hot Rod::

He saw the Metrix.
"No! I thought I destroyed it!"
He looked at Feline making sure she wasn't being hurt. The beam struck
him.
(OOC: Insert the song from TF:TM 'The Touch' here!)
Tha black and red paint job washed away, revealing his traditional
colors. The reprograming was gone, and he thought of a plan. His optics
turned blue again.

He looked at Angel Prime.
"Sorry, it didn't work Arc, or whatever you are going to call yourself
now. You are a fool!"
He winked at Angel Prime, to tell him that he was acting. He made sure
that Feline couldn't see.
"So now what?"

OOC:You got the touch, you got the power. GO!! Do dun da da... sorry!
